channel.title: Need Team of Programmers (see topic for details)
channel.description:
Hello everyone! :) I am going to create an RSPS and need assistance. I will need a team of programmers I have a source and client that we will be working on (not my work). I could do it myself but it will take to long and I am prepared to offer 10% of all earnings made from but not limited to Donations and Website advertisements. Aswell as a co-owner position on the finished server. I will need approximately 5 people to work on this and you will need to meet the following requirements:
1) RSPS knowledge 2) Java knowledge 3) A computer (obviously) 4) And a desire to create an RSPS
Thats about all it isnt much, I hope to get a bunch of reply's. One thing I would also like to mention that you do not need skype and we will not be meeting in person because of what country you might live in or your age as there is no age requirment.
If you are interested please email me at rsommer@sympatico.ca or post a reply to this post!
Thanks for your time!
Ryan
